title: Photostat, "Ground plan of an apartment in the apartment building on Rue Heine, Paris", ca. 1925
medium: Photostat and black ink on tracing paper
signed: Signed lower right in black ink: Dressee par/ L'Architecte soussigne/ Paris le 4 Decembre 1925/ Hector Guimard
inscribed:
Inscribed top center in black ink: IMMEUBLE RUE H. HEINE/ PLAN DES ETAGES
Inscribed on bottom center in black ink: RUE HEINE
description: Ground plan of a 9 room private apartment in the apartment building designed by Hector Guimard on Rue Heine. Function and scale of rooms noted throughout design.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photostat, "Ground plan of an apartment in the apartment building on Rue Heine, Paris", ca. 1925.
ca. 1925. Photostat and black ink on tracing paper. Gift of Mme. Hector Guimard. 1950-66-30.
